thread.section_title: Logoscientist Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Logoscientist | logoscientist.net
thread.title: barnett1

author: barnett1
title: barnett1
text:
My overall experience with Logo scientist was very positive! Easy, outstanding customer service on chat, loved the dashboard. Always received updates via email and even a courtesy voice mail to give me an update on status and timeline.
Allen Stanley was extremely helpful, great communicator and fast turn around between my self and the rest of the team. He did an outstanding job and so appreciated him being on my account!
